WORD Secondary VLAN IDs of the private VLAN SVI interface mapping add Add a VLAN to private VLAN list remove Remove a VLAN from private VLAN list If we add a private-vlan mapping to the SVI it works like a promicuous port for all the secondary vlans mapped, reachable by both isolated and community ports:
